Summary: Driving threw New England taking some video of scenery.
divs: Sighting DetailsON MAY 11.2009 TRAVELING THREW NEW ENGLAND OVER THE MASS TURNPIKE I CAPTURED A ORANGE TRIANGLE UFO, AND MANY OTHER ANOMILIES, SMALL GREY HUMANIODS, BALLS OF LITE, LITESHAFTS COMING DOWN AROUND ME, I ALSO BEEN VERY ILL SINCE THIS OCCURED....I,M WONDERING WHAT TO TELL MY DOCTOR ABOUT THIS, BECAUSE I THINK THATS WHY I,M ILL, THE UFO IS RIGHT OVER MY CAR....I HAVE THE VIDEO AND STILL SHOTS OF THIS AMAIZING UFO. Witness spoke on phone with Dispatcher and provided the following information: 6-13-09 . . . been feeling sick, nausea, started next day after taking video, says he is having the same symptoms as radiation poisoning, headache, light headedness, fatigue, sleeping all the time, unable to work. Has a scab on his back and a lump on his back and doesn���t remember them being there before.the aliens he talks about is from the small gray probes you see in the video, the light shift comes in the beginning of the video where a car is coming at him he freezes the picture says it is like the sun reflection but they are surrounding his car, he is wiling to send us the unedited video for viewing, the camera used was a Samsung Digimax V5, 12X zoom has a schnieder lens 7.7 ��� 23.1 mm , Resolution 5.30 Mpixel, The bars on the video is from editing part of the screen, the slowing down portion of the video is from freeze frame . . . MUFON DISPATCH S.COX 6-13-09
